description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are: (a) to establish basic processes for efficient and transparent management of public expenditures; and (b) to develop adequate institutional capacity to support the implementation and sustained functioning of an automated financial management information system (FMIS).

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sch. 2, p.3 | Description :The Recipient shall maintain the PGS with a composition, resources and TORsatisfactory to IDA | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Sch.2, p.7 | Description :The Recipient shall establish and make operational the IT Center and shall appoint adirector of the IT Center, on terms and conditions satisfactory to the Association | Frequency :Yearly
